txt.en:
'The great tumult of the gertheryg can be heard even inside these caves at night. It is a fear I no longer wish to live with.

'Will you help me, brave [placeholder]? We must reduce the numbers of the terrible beasts. Gath Forthnír must be made safer, and I worry that with these beasts about, our doors will not hold.

'Thin their number and return to me. They dwell in the Bails of Himbar, calling themselves the Flayers.'
'Well done! I will inform the others that we have less to fear. But these are still dark times, and there is much to be done!'
'Hurry to the Bails in Himbar. They are to the west of Gath Forthnír. We must defeat the gertheryg soon before they strengthen their numbers and attack!'
Maerchiniath has asked you to thin out the numbers of the gertheryg in and around the Bails of Himbar.
The gorthorog-flayers reside in and around the Bails of Himbar.\n\nMaerchiniath has instructed you to thin the numbers of the gorthorog-flayers.
Gath Forthnír is west of Himbar in the mountains.\n\nHaving defeated many gertheryg, you should return to Maerchiniath and tell him of your success.
